title: 2003년 O.J. Distributing, Inc., A/K/A Great State Beverage v. Hornell Brewing Company, Inc., D/B/A Ferolito, Vultaggio & Sons, A/K/A Arizona Beverages 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: O.J. Distributing, Inc., A/K/A Great State Beverage v. Hornell Brewing Company, Inc., D/B/A Ferolito, Vultaggio & Sons, A/K/A Arizona Beverages. 판결일: 2003-09-30. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: O.J. DISTRIBUTING, INC., A/K/A Great State Beverage, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. HORNELL BREWING COMPANY, INC., D/B/A Ferolito, Vultaggio & Sons, A/K/A Arizona Beverages, Defendant-Appellee
**판결일**: 2003-09-30
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Batchelder, Clay, Moore

## 변호인

Matthew A. Gibb (argued and briefed), Gibb Law Firm, Shelby Township, MI, for Appellant., John A. Ruemenapp (argued and briefed), Weisman, Young, Schloss & Ruemenapp, Bingham Farms, MI, for Ap-pellee.

## 인용

- 340 F.3d 345

## 판결문 요약

340 F.3d 345
    O.J. DISTRIBUTING, INC., a/k/a Great State Beverage, Plaintiff-Appellant,v.HORNELL BREWING COMPANY, INC., d/b/a Ferolito, Vultaggio & Sons, a/k/a AriZona Beverages, Defendant-Appellee.
    No. 01-1583.
    United States Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit.
    Argued: January 28, 2003.
    Decided and Filed: August 14, 2003.
    Petition for Rehearing Denied En Banc: September 30, 2003. Pursuant to Sixth Circuit Rule 206
    
      ARGUED: Matthew A. Gibb, GIBB LAW FIRM, Shelby Township, Michigan, for Appellant. John A. Ruemenapp, WEISMAN, YOUNG, SCHLOSS & RUEMENAPP, Bingham Farms, Michigan, for Appellee.
      ON BRIEF: Matthew A. Gibb, GIBB LAW FIRM, Shelby Township, Michigan, for Appellant.
      John A. Ruemenapp, WEISMAN, YOUNG, SCHLOSS & RUEMENAPP, Bingham Farms, Michigan, for Appellee.
      Before: BATCHELDER, MOORE, and CLAY, Circuit Judges.
      CLAY, J., delivered the opinion of the court, in which MOORE, J., joined. BATCHELDER, J. (pp. 360-361), delivered a separate opinion concurring in part and dissenting in part.
      OPINION
      CLAY, Circuit Judge.
    
    
      1
      Plaintiff, O.J. Distributing, Inc., a/k/a Great State Beverage, appeals from the district court's order entered on March 29, 2001 granting the motion brought by Defendant, Hornell Brewing Company, Inc., d/b/a Ferolito, Vultaggio & Sons, a/k/a AriZona Beverages, to confirm an arbitration award, while dismissing Defendant's motion to dismiss Plaintiff's amended...
